name: Extreme Shopping
description:
Developers: Federico Daniel Sanchez and Nicolás Alejandro Feroglio Berman

Game made in 1 week in Unreal Engine 4 for the "Epic MegaJam 2021"

List of any content that was created before the jam, all from Epic Marketplace:

-Animation Starter Pack

-Bossy Enemy Animation Pack

-FPS Weapon Bundle

-Pro Icon Pack

-Sci Fi Robot

-Stylized Character Kit: Casual 01

-Supermarket
